title: Datasaurus Royale
description: Using Genetic Algorithm and Pygames, my team simulated dinosaur evolution which tested dinosaur traits and behaviors to see which comes out on top.

title: League of Legends: Champion Age Analysis
description: Using data from competitive League of Legends, my partner and I made a model which predicted wins based primarily upon how old a champion was.

title: AI Learns Pokemon Emerald Rogue
description: Pokemon emerald rogue is a randomly generated run based game, and using Gym, I trained an AI using reinforcement learning in order to beat the game.

title: Diabetes Readmission Model
description: Based upon data of hospital readmission of diabetes patients, my group and I took responsible data science into action and made a fair model.

title: Ai Learns Checkers
description: Ai learns how to play checkers.

title: Manga Rating to Anime
description: Model predicting anime rating based off of manga rating.
